General.Name: Atlantica Sustainable Infrastructure PLC
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Atlantica Sustainable Infrastructure plc owns, manages, and invests in renewable energy, storage, natural gas and heat, electric transmission lines, and water assets in the United States, Canada, Mexico, Peru, Chile, Colombia, Uruguay, Spain, Italy, Algeria, and South Africa. The company was formerly known as Atlantica Yield plc and changed its name to Atlantica Sustainable Infrastructure plc in May 2020. Atlantica Sustainable Infrastructure plc was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Brentford, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Great West House, Brentford, United Kingdom, TW8 9DF
